SEARCH

Uses of Package
com.warzone.controller

Packages that use com.warzone.controller
Package
Description
com.warzone.controller
Contains game engine and commands which are needed to start execution.
com.warzone.controller.state
Phases of the game.
com.warzone.controller.state.edit
Edit phase which contains PreEdit and PostEdit class to load map in edit mode and to edit the loaded map.
com.warzone.controller.state.gamephase
Game phase contains sub phases which are GameSetup, GamePlay and end phase.
com.warzone.controller.state.gamephase.endphase
End phase is set when just one player remains excluding neutralPlayer#1, winner is printed in this phase.
com.warzone.controller.state.gamephase.gameplay
Contains classes required to play the game like issue orders which takes orders from players, execute orders which executes the orders provided by players.
com.warzone.controller.state.gamephase.gamesetup
Contains methods used to set the necessary elements to play the game like load map, add or remove player and assigncountries.
com.warzone.elements.orders
Contains all the orders which the user provides during game phase
com.warzone.elements.savegameplay
 
com.warzone.strategy
Contains four types of strategy of player: Random, Cheater Aggressive, Benevolent and Human.
  • Classes in com.warzone.controller used by com.warzone.controller
    Class
    Description
    GameEngine
    Game Engine class is the starting point of the game where commands are processed and extracted to support the functionalities provided by the commands.
    GameEngine.CommandType
    Enumeration for the command types
    GameInitialization
    Main class from where game starts, user commands are taken from here.
    LogEntryBuffer
    The LogEntryBuffer class inherits Observable class whose function is to get the outputs that are received after executing commands
    LogWriter
    The LogWriter class inherits Observer and whose function is to write the output to the log file
    Observable
    The Observable class implements diccnnection or disconnection between observes and subject.
    Observer
    Interface for the Observer, which specifies the implementation of the update function in all views.
